item.title: jupyter小技巧
item.description: 1.jupyter安装 1 2 3 4 conda install jupyter notebook # 安装anaconda之后，下载jupyter notebook conda install -c conda-forge jupyter_contrib_nbextensions # jupyter notebook扩展安装 pip install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple autopep8 # 代码
